name: JNS Gardening Solutions
description: React/Express based website developed for local gardening business. Includes booking system and administrator back end.

name: UWA Pharmacy Case
description: Web application developed by a team of UWA students for Dr. Kenneth Lee and the UWA Master of Pharmacy course. Allows students to create, practice, share, and comment on real life case studies.

name: Bastion Droptimizer
description: Aggregates the results of raidbots.com simulationcraft reports for an entire raid team enabling leadership to make better decisions about how to distribute loot.

name: Dominion
description: Multiplayer 4X grand stratergy game based on Civilization 5. Procedural board generation and A* pathfinding.

name: MMO
description: Browser MMORPG built with typescript, THREE.js, and socket.io.

name: Infinite Frontier
description: Space themed 4X grand stratergy game. Solar system generation and colonisable planets.

name: Portfolio Site
description: Static portfolio site built with Nunjucks. Try out the terminal right now by typing `help` and pressing enter!

name: Gabr
description: Microblogging website built with django, sass, and bootstrap.

name: Movie Rankings
description: Movie Rankings is a website that allows users show off their favourite movies and create polls about them. Built with flask, jinja and bootstrap.

name: Oldschool Runescape World Ping
description: Check your ping to the oldschool runescape game servers.

name: Attendance Report
description: Generate a report showing how often players are late, leave early, or fail to attend World of Warcraft raids based on their presence in combat log data retrieved from warcraftlogs.com.

name: Arwic Bot
description: Modular bot for the chat app discord. Includes user permissions, youtube music player, server administration, embeded messages, world of warcraft utilities, and fun hidden responses.

name: Needs More JPEG Bot
description: Reddit bot that responds to commenters' requests for a lower qaulity version of an image.

name: Run
description: Single button infinite runner game developed in unity. Press any key to make the player jump off the ground or wall he is stuck to.

name: Pong
description: Pong implemented with HTML5 canvas.

name: ElvUI Better Talent Frame
description: Improves the talent frame by adding customisable profiles and reimplementing the ability to view your selected talents from non-active specs.

name: Wow Discord Rich Presence
description: Discord Rich Presence for World of Warcraft. The AddOn gathers data from the game and displays it to the python script, which updates the users discord presence.

name: Arwic Alt Manager
description: Stores useful data about every character on a player's account and displays it in a table.

name: ElvUI Recount Recount Inherit Global Fade
description: An extension of the popular AddOn ElvUI that causes recount to respect the interface fading feature.

name: Simc Dungeon Jorunal
description: Provides a function to generate simulationcraft input based on boss loot tables found in the dungeon journal. The user can take this output and input it into simulationcraft, which is a program that tells you what gear will allow your character to do the most damage.
